languages.text: {n}Существом, выдернувшим вас из небытия, оказывается грязно-бурая лошадь. Зверь следит за вами из темноты большими черными глазами. Голодными и испуганными.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Лошадь смотрит на нас, мы на нее.

languages.text: {n}The creature that dragged you out of unconsciousness turns out to be a muddy-brown horse. From the darkness, the beast follows you with its large, black eyes — it looks hungry and frightened.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Существом, выдернувшим вас из небытия, оказывается грязно-бурая лошадь. Зверь следит за вами из темноты большими черными глазами. Голодными и испуганными.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The creature that dragged you out of unconsciousness turns out to be a muddy-brown horse. From the darkness, the beast follows you with its large, black eyes — hungry and frightened.{/n}
{n}The creature that dragged you out of unconsciousness turns out to be a muddy-brown horse. From the darkness, the beast follows you with its large, black eyes — it looks hungry and frightened.{/n}
{n}The creature that dragged you out of unconsciousness turns out to be a muddy-brown horse. From the darkness, the beast follows you with its large, black eyes — hungry, dull-witted, and savage.{/n}
{n}The creature that dragged you out of unconsciousness turns out to be a muddy-brown horse. From the darkness, the beast follows you with its large, black eyes — it looks hungry and frightened.{/n}

languages.text: {n}把你唤醒的生物原来是一匹棕褐色的马。在一片黑暗之中，它又大又黑的眼睛注视着你，它看起来饥肠辘辘、惊慌不已。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature that dragged you out of unconsciousness turns out to be a muddy-brown horse. From the darkness, the beast follows you with its large, black eyes — it looks hungry and frightened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}把你唤醒的生物原来是一匹棕褐色的马。在一片黑暗之中，它又大又黑的眼睛注视着你，它看起来饥肠辘辘、惊慌不已。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La criatura que te ha sacado de la inconsciencia resulta ser un caballo castaño. La bestia, medio oculta en la penumbra, te sigue con sus enormes ojos negros; parece hambriento y asustado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature that dragged you out of unconsciousness turns out to be a muddy-brown horse. From the darkness, the beast follows you with its large, black eyes — it looks hungry and frightened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La criatura que te ha sacado de la inconsciencia resulta ser un caballo castaño. La bestia, medio oculta en la penumbra, te sigue con sus enormes ojos negros; parece hambriento y asustado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bilincini kaybettiğin yerden seni çekip çıkaran yaratığın çamur kahvesi renkli bir at olduğu anlaşılıyor. Hayvan, o kara iri gözleriyle karanlığın içinden seni izliyor. Aç ve korkmuş görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature that dragged you out of unconsciousness turns out to be a muddy-brown horse. From the darkness, the beast follows you with its large, black eyes — it looks hungry and frightened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bilincini kaybettiğin yerden seni çekip çıkaran yaratığın çamur kahvesi renkli bir at olduğu anlaşılıyor. Hayvan, o kara iri gözleriyle karanlığın içinden seni izliyor. Aç ve korkmuş görünüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}意識を失っていたあなたを目覚めさせたのは泥茶色の馬だった。暗闇から、その大きな黒い目であなたを追う―空腹でおびえているように見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature that dragged you out of unconsciousness turns out to be a muddy-brown horse. From the darkness, the beast follows you with its large, black eyes — it looks hungry and frightened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}意識を失っていたあなたを目覚めさせたのは泥茶色の馬だった。暗闇から、その大きな黒い目であなたを追う―空腹でおびえているように見える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La créature qui vous a tiré de l'inconscience s'avère un cheval bai, dont la teinte tend vers le marron boueux. Malgré l'obscurité, elle scrute le moindre de vos mouvements de ses grands yeux noirs. Elle a l'air effrayée, mais surtout affamée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature that dragged you out of unconsciousness turns out to be a muddy-brown horse. From the darkness, the beast follows you with its large, black eyes — it looks hungry and frightened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La créature qui vous a tiré de l'inconscience s'avère un cheval bai, dont la teinte tend vers le marron boueux. Malgré l'obscurité, elle scrute le moindre de vos mouvements de ses grands yeux noirs. Elle a l'air effrayée, mais surtout affamée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kreatur, die dich aus der Bewusstlosigkeit geweckt hat, entpuppt sich als schlammbraunes Pferd. Das Tier mustert dich aus der Dunkelheit mit großen, schwarzen Augen. Es sieht hungrig und verängstigt aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature that dragged you out of unconsciousness turns out to be a muddy-brown horse. From the darkness, the beast follows you with its large, black eyes — it looks hungry and frightened.{/n}
